data.lyric:
[ti:Jingle Bell Rock]
[ar:Bobby Helms]
[al:That's Christmas to Us]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.31]Jingle Bell Rock - Bobby Helms
[00:00.90]Composed by：Bobby Helms
[00:01.54]
[00:08.17]Jingle bell jingle bell jingle bell rock
[00:12.08]Jingle bells swing and jingle bells ring
[00:15.61]
[00:16.11]Snowin' and blowin' up bushels of fun
[00:19.58]
[00:20.15]Now the jingle hop has begun
[00:24.05]Jingle bell jingle bell jingle bell rock
[00:27.98]Jingle bells chime in jingle bell time
[00:31.46]
[00:32.00]Dancin' and prancin' in Jingle Bell Square
[00:35.47]
[00:36.09]In the frosty air
[00:39.58]What a bright time it's the right time
[00:43.40]
[00:43.91]To rock the night away
[00:47.48]Jingle bell time is a swell time
[00:51.52]
[00:52.17]To go glidin' in a one-horse sleigh
[00:55.42]
[00:55.94]Giddyap jingle horse pick up your feet
[00:59.70]Jingle around the clock
[01:03.76]Mix and a-mingle in the jinglin' feet
[01:07.19]
[01:08.01]That's the jingle bell rock
[01:10.76]
[01:11.80]Jingle bell jingle bell jingle bell rock
[01:15.13]
[01:15.73]Jingle bells chime in jingle bell time
[01:19.24]
[01:19.79]Dancin' and prancin' in Jingle Bell Square
[01:23.28]
[01:23.95]In the frosty air
[01:27.65]What a bright time it's the right time
[01:31.71]To rock the night away
[01:35.40]Jingle bell time is a swell time
[01:39.49]
[01:40.18]To go glidin' in a one-horse sleigh
[01:43.45]
[01:44.10]Giddyap jingle horse pick up your feet
[01:47.42]
[01:47.94]Jingle around the clock
[01:52.01]Mix and a-mingle in the jinglin' feet
[01:55.50]
[01:56.35]That's the jingle bell
[01:58.37]That's the jingle bell
[02:00.35]That's the jingle bell rock
data.trans:
[ti:Jingle Bell Rock]
[ar:Various Artists]
[al:Merry Christmas With Much Love - 50 Wonderful Songs for a Joyful Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:09.32]叮叮当，叮叮当，铃儿响叮当
[00:12.59]
[00:13.20]叮叮当，叮叮当，铃儿响叮当
[00:16.48]
[00:16.99]今晚滑雪多快乐，我们坐在雪橇上
[00:21.63]现在舞会已经开始了
[00:24.45]
[00:25.02]叮叮当，叮叮当，铃儿响叮当
[00:28.80]铃声一起响起真悦耳
[00:32.23]
[00:32.74]在广场里雀跃跳舞
[00:36.73]
[00:37.32]天气冷的都结霜了
[00:39.79]
[00:40.54]多快乐啊 现在正是时候
[00:44.71]把夜晚赶走
[00:47.11]
[00:48.31]铃声响起就是最棒的时候
[00:53.60]驾着单马雪橇往前滑
[00:56.94]起身吧 马儿 准备要走了
[01:00.93]日以继夜不要停
[01:03.29]
[01:05.02]随着叮当响声向前
[01:08.92]铃儿响叮当
[01:11.31]
[01:12.90]叮叮当，叮叮当，铃儿响叮当
[01:16.94]铃声一起响起真悦耳

[01:24.25]
[01:25.63]天气冷的都结霜了
[01:28.02]
[01:28.63]多快乐啊 现在正是时候
[01:32.56]把夜晚赶走
[01:35.55]
[01:36.42]铃声响起就是最棒的时候
[01:41.59]驾着单马雪橇往前滑
[01:45.50]起身吧 马儿 准备要走了
[01:49.44]日以继夜不要停

[01:53.25]随着叮当响声向前
